archimate:Requirement.name: IM.1.3.11a: a) encryption (to prevent unauthorised disclosure during storage and transmission) and effective encryption key management (e.g. when handling, storing and archiving keys)
archimate:Requirement.documentation: This is a standard topic modelled from the 2022 Version of the Standards Of Good Practice by ISF. It has been adopted as version 3 of the Security Baseline.
